languages.text: "Ирлиэт, ради мести твои собратья истребили сотни тысяч людей на этом мире. Такой путь ты видишь для своего народа?"

traits.locale_text: "Ирлиэт, ради мести твои собратья истребили сотни тысяч людей на этом мире. Такой путь ты видишь для своего народа?"

languages.text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"
languages.original_text: "Ирлиэт, ради мести твои собратья истребили сотни тысяч людей на этом мире. Такой путь ты видишь для своего народа?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the way you see for your people?"
"Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the way you see for your people?"
"Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the way you see for your people?"
"Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the way you see for your people?"
"Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"
"Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"

languages.text: «Yrliet, tus congéneres han masacrado a centenares de miles de personas en este mundo en nombre de la venganza. ¿Es éste el camino que deseas para tu gente?».
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"

traits.locale_text: «Yrliet, tus congéneres han masacrado a centenares de miles de personas en este mundo en nombre de la venganza. ¿Es éste el camino que deseas para tu gente?».

languages.text: “伊莉耶特，你的族人以复仇的名义，在这个世界上屠杀了成千上万的人。你就是这样袒护你的族人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"

traits.locale_text: “伊莉耶特，你的族人以复仇的名义，在这个世界上屠杀了成千上万的人。你就是这样袒护你的族人吗？”

languages.text: « Yrliet, vos semblables ont massacré des centaines de milliers de gens dans ce monde par pur esprit de vengeance. Est-ce vraiment la voie que votre peuple doit emprunter ? »
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"

traits.locale_text: « Yrliet, vos semblables ont massacré des centaines de milliers de gens dans ce monde par pur esprit de vengeance. Est-ce vraiment la voie que votre peuple doit emprunter ? »

languages.text: 「ユリエット、君の血族は復讐の名の下に、この世界で何十万もの人々を虐殺した。これが君の民のやり口なのか？」
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエット、君の血族は復讐の名の下に、この世界で何十万もの人々を虐殺した。これが君の民のやり口なのか？」

languages.text: "Yrliet, Eure Verwandten haben auf dieser Welt im Namen der Rache Hunderttausende abgeschlachtet. Ist das der Pfad, den Ihr für Euer Volk seht?"
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, Eure Verwandten haben auf dieser Welt im Namen der Rache Hunderttausende abgeschlachtet. Ist das der Weg, den Ihr für Euer Volk seht?"

languages.text: "Yrliet, soydaşların intikam uğruna bu dünyada yaşayan yüz binlerce insanı katletti. Halkın için uygun gördüğün yol bu mu?"
languages.original_text: "Yrliet, your kin butchered hundreds of thousands of people on this world in the name of vengeance. Is this the path you see for your people?"

traits.locale_text: "Yrliet, soydaşların intikam uğruna bu dünyada yaşayan yüz binlerce insanı katletti. Halkın için uygun gördüğün yol bu mu?"
